p:
Total biomass conditional on germination was separately analysed for each level of climate with a generalized linear mixed model. When grown under current temperatures, there were no significant effects of native species, site or soil on total biomass [
see Supporting Informationâ€” Table S3 ]. Under future climate conditions, there was a significant main effect for site, a significant two-way interaction between species and site, and more importantly, a significant three-way interaction between species, site and soil ( Table 3).
